name: IOUserClient
desc: A connection to another service managed by the system.

items.name: - AsyncCompletion
items.desc: Send asynchronous arguments to a completion supplied by ExternalMethod().

items.name: - ExternalMethod
items.desc: Receive arguments from IOKit.framework IOConnectMethod calls.

items.name: - CopyClientMemoryForType
items.desc: Return an IOMemoryDescriptor to be mapped into the client task.
